name: Planet !!
description:
This is a game for android device, using .aab file format. 

Also this game requires GOOGLE API 30, which means you have to use android 11 or higher to play the game. (I used to make this game for lower version of android but google play at that time required the api 30 and did not accept the lower version). :<<<

Anyway, feel free to enjoy the game and thanks for supporting me.
